LanguageData.AnimalNaturalHeartLarge.label: animal heart (large)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalHeartLarge.description:
Supplies blood and oxygen to all parts of the body. Ready to find a new owner.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 1.3 or greater, but less than 2.4.
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalKidneyLarge.label: animal kidney (large)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalKidneyLarge.description:
Filters and removes waste products from the blood.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 1.3 or greater, but less than 2.4.
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLiverLarge.label: animal liver (large)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLiverLarge.description:
Plays an important role in metabolism.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 1.3 or greater, but less than 2.4.
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLungLarge.label: animal lung (large)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLungLarge.description:
Essential part of the respiratory system.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 1.3 or greater, but less than 2.4.
LanguageData.AnimalPainstopperLarge.label: animal painstopper (large)
LanguageData.AnimalPainstopperLarge.description:
This brain implant will make an animal not feel pain.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 1.3 or greater, but less than 2.4.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalArmLarge.label: bionic animal arm (large)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalArmLarge.description:
One of the most sophisticated arm replacements. Gives extreme strength to its user.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 1.3 or greater, but less than 2.4.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEarLarge.label: bionic animal ear (large)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEarLarge.description:
An advanced artificial ear implant. A collection of invisible subdermal microphones capture sound and transmit it to a biogel nerve interface that links directly with the auditory nerve. It's sensitive enough to hear a cat before you see it, can't be damaged by loud noise, and automatically tunes itself to pick out meaningful sounds in noisy environments.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 1.3 or greater, but less than 2.4.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEyeLarge.label: bionic animal eye (large)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEyeLarge.description:
Advanced piece of technology made not only to fully replace a natural eye, but also to give supernatural vision abilities.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 1.3 or greater, but less than 2.4.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalLegLarge.label: bionic animal leg (large)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalLegLarge.description:
Bionic leg uses cutting-edge technology to give its owner extreme walking comfort and strength.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 1.3 or greater, but less than 2.4.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalArmLarge.label: prosthetic animal arm (large)
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalArmLarge.descripti:
Simple but durable arm prosthesis.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 1.3 or greater, but less than 2.4.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalLegLarge.label: prosthetic animal leg (large)
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalLegLarge.descripti:
Simple prosthesis made to replace a missing leg. Not very comfortable but quite efficient.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of 1.3 or greater, but less than 2.4.
